function.name: analyze_gui
function.description: Analyzes the current GUI to find elements matching the target text and/or provided templates.

target_text.description: The text to search for in the GUI elements using OCR.

template_names.description: A list of template image names to search for (without extension).

template_path.description: The path to the directory containing template images. If not provided, reads from GUI_TEMPLATES_IMG_PATH environment variable.

threshold.description: The matching threshold between 0 and 1 for template matching.
